vividha pāpa malena
nānāvidha byasana bhājanam appasannam
paññā mayena bali sena nirākarotha
na ākampayanti sakalāḥ api ca loka dhammāḥ
cittam sadā apagata pāpa kilesa sallam
rūpa ādayaḥ ca vividhā visayā samaggā
meru sikharam mahatā anilena
saṃsāra dukkham agaṇeyya yathā muni indo
gambhirapāramita sāgaram uttaritvā
ñeyyam nipuṇam hata moha jālo
tasmai sadā para hitam paramam
ohāya sodhi gata mokkha sukham paresam
atthāya saṃcari bhavesu mahabbhayesu
evam sadā para hitam puratas karitvā
dhammaḥ mayā anucaritaḥ jagadattham eva
laddhāna dullabhataram ca manussa yonim
sabbam khaṇa sampadam ca
ñatvānaḥ dhammaṃ

original: Ko paññavā anavaraṃ na bhajeyya dhammaṃ?
analyzed: kaḥ paññavā an avaram na bhajeyya dhammaṃ
buddha samayam ati dullabham ca
saddhamma maggam asamam sivadam tathā iva
kalyāṇa mitta pavare mati sampadam ca

original: Ko buddhimā anavaraṃ na bhajeyya dhammaṃ?
analyzed: kaḥ buddhimā an avaram na bhajeyya dhammaṃ
evam pi dullabhataram vibhave su laddhā
viratā ubhayattha kāmā
saddhā ādi dhamma sahitā satata ppamattā
bho bho karotha amata adhigamāya puññam
